quote: I can think of nothing less pleasurable than a life devoted to pleasure. – John D. Rockefeller
fact: One of the reasons marijuana is illegal today is because cotton growers in the 1930s lobbied against hemp farmers they saw it as competition.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke:
I used to work at a stationery store.  But, I didn't feel like I was going anywhere.

So, I got a job at a travel agency.  Now, I know I'll be going places.
